author: arkurth
msg: Updated utils.pm::get_vmhost_info to allow vmprofile.profilename to be used for matching the $vmhost_identifier argument. The matching info is returned if the argument exactly matches vmprofile.profilename when multiple rows are retrieved. It had been returning null any time multiple rows were retrieved. This allows a specific vmhost-vmprofile to be retrieved when multiple vmhost entries exist for a computer.

author: pderop
msg: FELIX-4875 - Update DM integration test with latest ConfigAdmin.
FELIX-4876: DM Annotations bnd plugin compatible with Bndtools 2.4.1 / 3.0.0 versions.
FELIX-4877: DM Annotations should detect service type using all possible DM API bind signatures.
FELIX-4878: Support more signatures for Dependency callbacks.
FELIX-4880: Missing support for callback instance for some adapters.
Also did sone cleanup in some sample codes. Fixed some README typos.
The DM API is now exported with 4.1.0 version.
